title: Invite people to {{ name }}
workspace_instructions: Once they accept the invitation, they will be able to invite new members, create new projects and edit other workspace settings.
instructions: Start typing a name or username.
alternative: You can also invite by email or enter multiple addresses separated by a comma.
error_add_email: Add at least an email or username
error_missing_people: There are people not added to the list. Add them and try again.
error_add_least_one: Add at least one person to the list
error_several_emails: There are one or more invalid email addresses.
error_more_than_fifty: You can only invite 50 people at once. Remove { invitations, plural, one {1 user} other {# users} } and try again.
invitation_success: Your { invitations, plural, one { invitation was} other { # invitations were} } successfully sent!
only_member_success: This person is already a member and won't receive a new invitation
only_members_success: { members, plural, one { 1 person is already a member and won't receive a new invitation} other { # people are already members and won't receive a new invitations} }
failed_send_invite: Failed to send { invitations, plural, one { the invitation. } other {# invitations.} } Please try again in a few minutes.
failed_resend_invite: Failed to send { invitations, plural, one { the invitation. } other {# invitations.} }
pending_tooltip: This user has already been invited. You are going to resend them an invitation.
invitation_accept_message: You are now a member of {{project}} project.
no_results: There are no matching results. Use an email instead.
